item.title: ABOUT
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
SOFIA DOE

Through the delicate interplay of light and shadow, I capture the organic symphony of nature and the structured elegance of man-made environments, inviting viewers to appreciate the intricate dance between these two seemingly disparate elements that together compose the tapestry of our world.

Pictures from Shivansh Sharma Thank you!
